theWeaver:Restrain.NAME: Restrain
theWeaver:Restrain.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. If the enemy is Weak, gain an additional !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This enemy doesn't intend to attack.

theWeaver:Brace.NAME: Brace
theWeaver:Brace.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, gain !B! Block per discarded card.

theWeaver:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theWeaver:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theWeaver:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theWeaver:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theWeaver:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theWeaver:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theWeaver:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theWeaver:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theWeaver:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !theWeaver:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theWeaver:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theWeaver:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theWeaver:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
